welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Sioux City! Get ready to experience the charm and hospitality of our city, known for its beautiful riverfront and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that South Sioux City has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sioux Gateway Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Sioux Gateway Airport caters to private and charter flights, with its own dedicated facilities and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit or data usage restrictions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is a modern and spacious building that offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Municipal Airport is primarily used for domestic flights, and features a variety of shops and restaurants for travelers to enjoy.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Municipal Airport is primarily used for international flights, and offers a range of services such as currency exchange and duty-free shopping.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
